title: Crank it up
author: VD
content_html:
The Internet drama goes to 11, courtesy of CDAN:

The internet host who has been banned everywhere, received a bunch of under the table crypto money was supposed to share the six figure windfall with several other people. He has stiffed all of them. Well, they probably won’t kill him until they torture him for his digital wallet password. 

This might explain why DLive suddenly went on its auto-banning frenzy, if certain individuals were using it to launder questionable gains.
content_text:
The Internet drama goes to 11,
courtesy of CDAN
:
The internet host who has been banned everywhere, received a bunch of under the table crypto money was supposed to share the six figure windfall with several other people. He has stiffed all of them. Well, they probably won’t kill him until they torture him for his digital wallet password.
This might explain why DLive suddenly went on its auto-banning frenzy, if certain individuals were using it to launder questionable gains.
